function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to health care for remote and hard-to-reach populations","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected contagious diseases spread and lack of treatment","Mitigation":"Establishing effective community health extension systems and improving health care access for remote populations","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, community health worker programs","People":"Remote and hard-to-reach populations","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on health and nutrition priorities during COVID-19 response","Impact":"Potential increase in malnutrition and neglected public health issues","Mitigation":"Strategizing on cost and system efficiencies to address broader health and nutrition goals within COVID-19 response plans","Technologies":"Data-driven decision making, telemedicine, remote monitoring technologies","People":"Vulnerable women and children in LMICs","Owner":"Governments, donors, development partners"},{"Description":"Inadequate funding and resources for COVID-19 era investments","Impact":"Risk of reversed gains in survival, women's and children's health, and nutrition","Mitigation":"Restratigizing and reprioritizing investments based on data-driven decision making, and securing political will and commitment","Technologies":"Data-driven decision making, remote collaboration technologies, resource optimization tools","People":"Global population, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Governments, donors, development partners"}]}
